classType: Party Buff - Crit Rate + Crit Damage

pros: Has a lot of powerful utility with skills like Wind Walk, Emerald Flower, Sharp Eyes and Gale Barrier
Lots of damage boosting passives like Storm Elemental, Albatross and Touch of the Wind
Has short skill cooldowns and few skills with cooldowns
Cygnus Knight characters do not need Mastery Books
cons: Key-down Hurricane Skill Song of Heaven locks you in place when held

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Damage: +35% + (15% from Pinpoint Pierce debuff)
Ignore DEF: +15% + (15% from Pinpoint Pierce debuff)

buffInfo.active: , (Toggle), , , , , ,
buffInfo.summons: , (30s cd), (60s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (120s cd), (90s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (240s cd), (120s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Irena to become a Wind Archer

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete a series of quests in 4th Job

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Trifling Wind - Reinforce, Enhance and Double Chance
  • Song of Heaven - Reinforce and Boss Rush

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 0, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 3

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Breeze Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Shoots several arrows in front of you

primary.name: Wind Walk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Works in the air and stops at end of a platform.\nPassive Effect: Speed: 35, Jump: 15, Max Movement Speed: +20
primary.desc: Dash through enemies without taking any touch damage
details: Can be used in the air
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed

primary.name: Storm Elemental
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: +10%, Duration: 200 sec

primary.name: Whispers of the Wind
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Range: +160

primary.name: Fairy Spiral
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Damage: 175%, Number of Attacks: 3, Number of Enemies pushed back: 6.

primary.name: Gust Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 260%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Fires an arrow, if there are multiple enemies, you will fire multiple arrows
details: Each arrow hits only one enemy

primary.name: Trifling Wind I
primary.shortDesc: Max soul energy created: 3, Chance to create energy: 20%, Random enemies damaged: 170%, Chance to create enhanced soul energy: 5%, Damage of enhanced soul energy: 210%
primary.desc: When toggled, your attacks have a chance to create homing arrows

primary.name: Bow Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Bow Attack Speed increased for 200 sec

primary.name: Sylvan Aid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power: 20, Critical Rate: +10%, No Arrows Used for: 200 sec.

primary.name: Bow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Sentient Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 8. Attack 6 enemies with 165% damage. Steer by holding the skill key and using the directional keys. Maximum Range: 350. Does not activate with Trifling Wind and Storm Bringer.
primary.desc: When held, rains down a stream of arrows on enemies
details:
You can control the skill by using the Arrow Keys
  • You will stay locked in place while the skill is active
Does not trigger or Storm Bringer (Hyper Skill)

primary.name: Pinpoint Pierce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 340%, Number of Attacks: 2.\nActivates a debuff of 15% Damage and 15% Ignore Defense to all of Wind Archer's attacks for 30 sec.
primary.desc: Fires two arrows towards one enemy and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Attacks towards this enemy gain increased %Damage and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Trifling Wind II
primary.shortDesc: Max soul energy created: 4, Chance to create energy: 30%, Random enemies damaged: 215%, Chance to create enhanced soul energy: 10%, Damage of enhanced soul energy: 270%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage

primary.name: Albatross
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Duration: 200 sec. Attack Power: +20, Max HP: +1500, Critical Rate: +10% with increased attack speed.
primary.desc: Increases %Crit Rate, and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and grants flat Attack and Max HP
details: 4th Job has a skill that enhances Albatross which gives it a different effect

primary.name: Emerald Flower
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Duration: 60 sec. Crystal Flower HP: 20000 Slows affected enemies.
primary.desc: Creates a green crystal that attracts nearby enemies and takes aggro
details: Enemies nearby are also slowed

primary.name: Featherweight
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -30%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%.

primary.name: Second Wind
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +1000, Attack Power for 5 sec. after Avoid: +15

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec
details: To obtain Call of Cygnus, you need to complete the questline 'The Alliance Gathers' at Lv. 120

primary.name: Song of Heaven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 345%.\nFor each enemy struck fewer than Max Enemies Hit, damage done to each enemy increases by 20%, and the damage that would be dealt is doubled and applied as bonus damage.
primary.desc: Fires a hurricane of arrows that deals increased damage the fewer enemies there are
details: You cannot move while using this skill

primary.name: Spiraling Vortex
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Enemies pushed back: 7, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 5, Splash Damage: 230%, Number of Splash Damage Attacks: 2\n[Passive Effect: Sentient Arrow Damage: +275% points]
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that pushes enemies away
details: [Passive]: Permanetnly increases the %p Damage of

primary.name: Trifling Wind III
primary.shortDesc: Max soul energy created: 5, Chance to create energy: 50%, Random enemies damaged: 290%, Chance to create enhanced soul energy: 20%, Damage of enhanced soul energy: 390%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Touch of the Wind
primary.shortDesc: Attack power: +10%, Dexterity: +15%, Max HP: +20%, Additional Avoidability: +30%

primary.name: Bow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Final Damage: +25%, Critical Damage: +20%, Damage Against Bosses: +40%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage, %Crit Damage, and %Boss Damage

primary.name: Emerald Dust
primary.shortDesc: Increases Crystal Flower's Max HP to 40000, Monster DEF: --10%, Damage Intake: -20%
primary.desc: Increases the Max HP of summon and now grants reduces nearby enemy %DEF and increases %Damage Reduction while active

primary.name: Albatross Max
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 85, Attack Power: +50, Damage: +25%, Ignored Monster DEF: 15%, Critical Rate: 25%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +15, Elemental Resistance: +15%, Additional Attack Speed increase.
details: Increases Attack and %Crit Rate provided and increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Now increases %Damage, %Ignore DEF, Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Elemental Resistance

hyperPassive.name: Trifling Wind - Double Chance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Spirit Aura occurs twice and can hit a target twice

hyperActive.name: Storm Bringer
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Duration: 200 sec., Chance to summon a large arrow on attack: 30%, Additional Damage from Arrow: 500%
hyperActive.desc: While active, your attacks have a chance to create large homing arrows
details: Has no cooldown

hyperActive.name: Monsoon
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 430%, Number of Attacks: 12. Debuff Damage: 200% every 1 sec for 30 sec.\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a giant monsoon that attacks enemies in a large area
details: Surviving enemies gain a damaging debuff

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Cygnus class or Mihile in the party

fifthMain.name: Howling Gale
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Wind Energy increases by 1 every 20 sec (up to 2 max)\nConsume 1 Wind Energy - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 3, Duration: 10 sec\nConsume 2 Wind Energy - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 3
fifthMain.desc: Creates a giant vortex of wind that pushes enemies back. This skill costs a special resource called 'Wind Energy'
details: Gain 1 Wind Energy every 20 secs (max 2 Wind Energy)
[Consume 1 Wind Energy]: Creates a smaller vortex that is quicker but deals less damage
[Consume 2 Wind Energy]: Creates a giant vortex that is slower but deals more damage

fifthMain.name: Merciless Winds
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 8 sec. Creates 10 enemy-seeking Spirit Arrows that deal 1000% damage 3 times.
If more than one Spirit Arrow strikes the same enemy, the Final Damage of each additional arrow is reduced by 25%.
Enemies hit by Spirit Arrows take 1000% damage every 1 sec for 9 sec
Cooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create special arrows that seek out nearby enemies. Each additional arrow that hits the same enemy deals reduced %Final Damage
details: Enemies hit gain a damaging debuff

fifthMain.name: Gale Barrier
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 45 sec, creates a wind barrier with the 400 Elemental
Damage is nullified when the 1 Elemental is used for damage equal to 1% of max HP when hit. Also applies to attacks that deal damage proportional to the max HP.
Launches 3 whirlwind(s) that deal(s) 1100% damage every 2 sec upon attack. Decreases the Final Damage of the whirlwind by 50% if multiple whirlwinds attack 1 enemy.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a wind barrier that protects you from enemy attacks. Additionally, periodically when you attack, you create whirlwinds that seek and attack nearby enemies
details:
The barrier has a special resource called 'Elemental'. 1 Elemental is consumed per each 1% Max HP taken as damage while also blocking the attack. Once the barrier reaches 0 Elemental, you will no longer block attacks but the buff will still be active
  • The amount of Elemental that Gale Barrier increases with Skill Level

fifthMain.name: Vortex Sphere
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750. Creates a Vortex Sphere, which moves on a collision course with the enemy. The sphere periodically attacks up to 10 enemies, for 800% damage, 6 times.\nCollision occurs up to 20 times for each enemy.\nCooldown: 35 sec
fifthMain.desc: Fires a damaging orb that slowly travels forward while pulling in enemies
details: Each enemy can only be hit up to 20 times by the orb
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Note]: The actual skill should be green in color instead of blue

meta: Wind Archer is DEX archer class part of the Cygnus Knights. Wind Archers are known for their evasive playstyle and beautiful attacks
